name: Fell Dragon's Awakening
title: Fell Dragon's Awakening
desc: "It came down from the skies in an ominous black mist and ravaged our homeland..."

skills.desc:
Summon Fell Dragon.
During this match, for each card you discard from the Support Zone, Fell Dragon gains 1 Usage. For each card you discard from the Summon Zone, Fell Dragon gains 1 Effect. (Can stack. Max 5 stacks.)
(Fell Dragon: End Phase: Deal 1 Piercing DMG.
Usage(s): 1)
